column3: Nice atmosphere and the girl serving us else was excellent. She provided us some samples so we could make a choice. I was disappointed they did not have any Amber on the day we were there. I also thought the prices were a little expensive given that it was a brewery.
A hidden little craft brewery with laid back atmposhere and excellent choices of beer. They also have outside shaded area with corn hole and music playing.

column2: Good place with plenty beers to choose from
column3: Good place with plenty tasteful beers to choose from.It's even child and pet friendly but certain rules do apply!
